title: PullRequest
description: A Pull Request consists of a set of commits.

id.description: The unique ID of this PullRequest.

self.description: The canonical URI for this record.

repository.description: The `self` URI of the Repository, or a nested Repository record.

author.description: The `self` URI of the Actor, or a nested Actor record.

headRef.description: The head ref of a PullRequest

headSha.description: The head sha of a PullRequest

baseRef.description: The base ref of a PullRequest

baseSha.description: The base sha of a PullRequest

htmlUrl.description: The URL to view this PullRequest.

additionsCount.description: Lines of code added in this PullRequest.

deletionsCount.description: Lines of code deleted in this PullRequest.

changedFilesCount.description: Total number of changed files in this PullRequest.

mergedAt.description: The time the PullRequest was merged

createdAt.description: The time the PullRequest was created

updatedAt.description: The time the PullRequest was updated.
